data.meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).
data.sentence: The word وَالْقَمَرِ comes from the root ق م ر and is associated with the meanings: to be white. qamarun - moon (especially from the 3rd to 26th night).

data.meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.
data.sentence: The word تَلَاهَا comes from the root ت ل و and is associated with the meanings: To follow, walk behind, imitate, pursue, consecutive. To read, recite, peruse, rehearse, declare, meditate.Sought repeatedly, collect.Bond or obligation.One who relieves or aids another in singing.
